attributes.action: All children aged 16-19 and in full time education should recieve the full £30 a week EMA regardless of their parents income
attributes.additional_details: All children aged 16-19 should recieve the full £30.00 EMA weekly regardless of their parents income. Not all parents who earn a decent wage help their children financially to attend college and it is hard to find work as most places require experience in their fields. Providing they attend all children should recieve the weekly allowance.
